decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (PL2/VP/2161/RA/01, PL2/VP/2161/RA/02, PL2/VP/2161/RA/03, PL2/VP/2161/RA/04, PL2/VP/2161/RA/05, PL2/VP/2161/RA/06 received on 02/04/2014 and PL2/VP/2161/RA/07 Rev A received on 15/05/2014) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.
Condition : 3 - The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the extension hereby permitted shall match those used in neighbouring property no.21 Rosemary Avenue.
Condition : 4 - The windows formed in the side elevation shall be obscure glazed, hinged to open inwards and shall not be repaired or replaced otherwise than with obscured glazing.
description: Erection of a first floor extension with hipped roof to flat with structural improvements to ground floor.
